name: Francesco Amigoni
content: Department Home Page Francesco Amigoni Office Address: Building 20, Floor 1, Room 018 Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria Politecnico di Milano Piazza Leonardo da Vinci, 32 20133 Milano (MI), Italy Phone Number: +39 02 2399-3475 Fax Number: +39 02 2399-3411 Email: Research Areas: Artificial Intelligence and Robotics Curriculum Vitae Research Interests Courses Foundations of Artificial Intelligence - Master of Science in Conputer Science and Engineering Multiagent Systems - Master of Science in Computer Science and Engineering Intelligent Multiagent Systems - PhD Program in Information Technology Artificial Intelligence - Master of Science in Conputer Science and Engineering Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems - Master of Science in Computer Science and Engineering Intelligenza Artificiale - Laurea magistrale in Ingegneria Informatica Agenti Autonomi e Sistemi Multiagente - Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica Informatica B - Laurea in Ingegneria Meccanica Intelligenza Artificiale (vecchio ordinamento) PoAReT (Politecnico di Milano Autonomous Robotics Rescue Team) won the Virtual Robot Competition of the RoboCup 2012 Rescue Simulation League.
